se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.physics
Class PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl

java.lang.Object
  se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.physics.PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, PhysicsBodyDefinition
public class PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PhysicsBodyDefinition, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

Class representing a PhysicsBody type. Body definitions can be re-used for many body creations.

For Box2D hackers: the PhysicsBodyDefinition contains a BodyDef and one or more FixtureDef(s).

Nested Class Summary
static class PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl.BodyType
          The body type to use for the body definition.

Constructor Detail

PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl

public PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Shape shape)
Construct a new body definition from a simple shape (dynamic body).

Parameters:
shape - the shape of the physics body. Will be managed and disposed of by the physics engine from now on.

PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl

public PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl(java.util.List<? extends com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Shape> shapes,
                                 PhysicsBodyDefinitionImpl.BodyType bodyType)
Construct a new body definition.

For Box2D hackers: all shapes will generate a fixture each that is a sensor.

Parameters:
shapes - the list of shapes of the physics body. Will be managed and disposed of by the physics engine from now on.
bodyType - the body type to use. Use dynamic if unsure.
